page_content: The page discusses traffic restrictions in Bern due to the New Year's reception of the Federal President.
The page reports on 239 people being controlled by the police following an unauthorized demonstration that resulted in property damage.
The page provides guidelines on how to calculate travel costs for commuting in Switzerland.
The page informs about traffic disruptions due to a cycling event from Bern to Interlaken.
The page details the Tour de Suisse 2008 cycling event and its impact on traffic.
